title: Pay and submit - status
question: Thank you
paragraph1: We’ve received your payment and your application.
paragraph3: You don’t need to pay as the net value of the estate is less than £5,000.
callout: Before your application can be processed, you need to send your documents by post.

update.failure: We could not submit your application. Your data has been saved, please try again later.

errors.validation: There has been a problem saving your application.
